ygData.subject: RE: Re: Silk Armors
ygData.msgSnippet: You are Very Correct. We had to do it by the old Trial & Error Method :(. But hey it worked out ... From:	Randy & Lori Alliani [mailto:alliani@flash.net] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
You are Very Correct. We had to do it by the old Trial & Error Method :(.
But hey it worked out

-----Original Message-----
From: Randy & Lori Alliani [mailto:alliani@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 10:11 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Re: Silk Armors

From: alliani@... (Randy & Lori Alliani)

These "recipes" weren't ever written down somewhere in the game?
Players had to experiment to see what worked?

Ouch.

Ferolyn

>From: srutkowski@...
>
>There are now several types of silk to be made. As you mentioned:
>Silk- made by combining spider silk
>Cured Silk- made by combining silk with heady kiola and other items
>Glowing Silk- made by combining silk (or maybe cured silk) with enchanters
>"mana" spells (vicious, purified, etc)
>Shadowed Silk- made by combining silk (don't know which one) with
necromancer
>spells, and quest items
>
>Not sure of all the stuff found so far, but several of the web sites have
the
>instructions
>
>Ailamil Faithbringer
>T. Marr
